GSD.product_version: versions from v5.3 to before v5.10.158
GSD.description:
ipv4: Handle attempt to delete multipath route when fib_info contains an nh reference

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.158 by commit 0b5394229ebae09afc07aabccb5ffd705ffd250e, it was introduced in version v5.3 by commit 493ced1ac47c48bb86d9d4e8e87df8592be85a0e. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: ipv4: Handle attempt to delete multipath route when fib_info contains an nh reference
